line.text: Where art thou Muse that thou forget so long
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To speak of that which gives thee all thy might
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Spend thou thy fury on some worthless song
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Darkening thy power to lend base subjects light
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Return forgetful Muse and straight redeem
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In gentle numbers time so idly spent
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Sing to the ear that doth thy lays esteem
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And gives thy pen both skill and argument
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Rise resty Muse my love sweet face survey
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If time have any wrinkle graven there
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If any be a satire to decay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And make time spoils despised everywhere
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Give my love fame faster than Time wastes life
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So thou prevent his scythe and crooked knife
